oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tyndall Field military pass, 1944 August 24
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a pass for Edward E. O'Connor, Jr., who served in the United States Army Air Forces during World War II. The card was issued at the gunnery school at Tyndall Field in Panama City, Florida, on August 24, 1944. The front of the card includes a photo of O'Connor, his name, grade (rank), and signature, as well as the expiration date and the signature of his commander. The back contains descriptive information including eye color, hair color, height, weight, race, and date of birth, and specifies that the pass is valid within 35 miles of Tyndall Field. Forms part of the Veterans History Project. 1 identification card : col; 2.5 x 3.75 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: O'Connor, Edward E., 1915-1992
United States. Army Air Forces.
